title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.13 - Scale of weights for flat races
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4054.13 - Scale of weights for flat races

State Regulations

For races on the flat the scale of weights prescribed
in Article 1 shall govern, and in respect of such races welter weights shall be
28 pounds above weight for age. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4054.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
